name: Avalanche
summary: This move deals damage. It has a priority of -4, and will deal double the damage if hit by a move in the same turn.
viability: This is a great move to switch into an opponent you know will attack you. Mamoswine can forego the risk that comes with Icicle Crash and use this move, essentially dealing a ton of damage along the way. This should be used with mostly bulky Pok√©mon, though, as taking too much damage might prevent you from even using Avalanche.
